TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi ObjectManager extends System.Object

summary.span: 在物件還原序列化時保持追蹤。

span.span: Keeps track of objects as they are deserialized.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 還原序列化期間，查詢來判斷是否序列化資料流中的物件參考是指已還原序列化的物件 （回溯參考），或尚未被物件還原序列化 （向前參考）。During deserialization, the queries the to determine whether a reference to an object in the serialized stream refers to an object that has already been deserialized (a backward reference), or to an object that has not yet been deserialized (a forward reference). 如果序列化資料流的參考是向前參考，則可以註冊使用修復。If the reference in the serialized stream is a forward reference, then the can register a fixup with the . 如果序列化資料流的參考是為了與舊版的參考，立即完成的參考。If the reference in the serialized stream is a backward reference, the immediately completes the reference. 修復是指完成在物件還原序列化程序尚未完成的物件參考的程序。Fixup refers to the process of finalizing object references not already completed during the object deserialization process. 已還原序列化的必要的物件後，將完成的參考。After the required object has been deserialized, the will complete the reference. 遵循一組規則，以指定的修復順序。The follows a set of rules that dictate the fixup order. 實作的所有物件或具有可以預期能夠從他們透過傳輸的所有物件可還原序列化物件樹狀結構時。All objects that implement or have a can expect to have all the objects that they transmitted through available when the object tree is deserialized. 不過，在父物件不能假設，其所有子物件將會完全都完成完整還原序列化時。However, a parent object cannot presume that all its child objects will be fully completed when it is fully deserialized. 所有子物件將都會出現，但並非所有的孫系物件一定都會存在。All child objects will be present but not all the grandchild objects will necessarily be present. 如果物件需要採取特定動作，取決於它的子物件上執行程式碼，它可以延遲這些動作，實作介面，並只在回呼叫此介面上時，才執行程式碼。If an object needs to take certain actions that depend on executing code on its child objects, it can delay these actions, implement the interface, and execute the code only when it is called back on this interface. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用從頭到尾參與所有物件圖形，一次周遊至每個物件的類別。The following code example shows how to use the class to walk through an object graph, traversing to each object only once. [!code-csharp[ObjectManager#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Misc/ObjectManager/CS/ObjectManager.cs#1)]

span.span: Registers a member of an object as it is deserialized, associating it with , and recording the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您必須提供`member`並`idOfContainingObj`參數如果`obj`是由於方式上執行修復物件。You need to provide the `member` and `idOfContainingObj` parameters if `obj` is a because of the way fixups are performed on objects. 若要儲存的資訊空間配置內嵌於其包含的物件。The space to store the information for a is allocated inline with its containing object. 不過，當會進行 boxed 處理向，就會失去與包含物件的連接。However, when the is boxed to be registered with the , it loses the connection with its containing object. 若要保證修復發生的執行個體中儲存在包含的物件而非經過 boxing 處理的執行個體，會保留一些額外資訊。To guarantee that fixups occur in the instance of the stored in the containing object and not in the boxed instance, the retains some additional information. 會保留資訊物件，其識別碼。 retains information about both the object and its ID. 還原序列化期間，更新可用來探索是否已還原序列化特定物件識別碼，或它是否不是向前參考的物件尚未還原序列化。Later during deserialization, can be used to discover whether a particular object ID has already been deserialized, or whether it is a forward reference to an object not yet deserialized.
